nodes.text: A male cyborg Rodian slave worked at the Crimson Dawn ore hub on Athus Klee. He was rescued from the mines by Dexter Jettster, who planned on reporting the operation to the Senate Council of Labor Abuses on Coruscant.

The Rodian cyborg had green skin and black eyes. He had a cybernetic attachment to his mouth that inhibited his ability to speak clearly enough for Dexter Jettster to understand him. He liked the stars, something Jettster observed when the pair spent an evening looking at the night sky together.
This Rodian was first mentioned in the 2018 reference book Star Wars: Smuggler's Guide written by Daniel Wallace.
